title: The use of lands situated within the limits of Planning Authority which have been reserved for certain purpose in the Development Plan, shall be regulated in regard to type and manner of development / redevelopment according to the provisions mentioned in following Table No
clause_text: The use of lands situated within the limits of Planning Authority which have been reserved for certain purpose in the Development Plan, shall be regulated in regard to type and manner of development / redevelopment according to the provisions mentioned in following Table No.11-A.
section: (2) 10.14.3 Development of land Notified for Acquisition
